translations: n.阻碍剂；妨碍物（deterrent 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Punishment And Deterrents: Enforcing God's law.
sentences.translation: 惩罚和威慑措施：加强“上帝的法制”。

sentences.sentence: Out-of-stock items and high prices are also deterrents.
sentences.translation: 缺少库存和较高的价格也是阻碍。

sentences.sentence: Their nuclear deterrents will be more greatly relied on.
sentences.translation: 他们将更多的依赖核震慑。
